::Eclipse::

    He looked at the symbol, and sniffed at it. He could recog=
nize some of Primal Prime in there, but throughout the ages the smell had d=
ispersed.
    "It's the same smell, just without the evil stench on it," He=
 said with a grave look on his face. "Eclipse, Maximize."
    Standing up i=
n his robot mode he decided that this was possibly the greatest threat to T=
ransformers in quite some time.
    "Prime has turned evil, and gotten an u=
pgrade," He said. "He was one of the Autobots greatest military minds. Now =
he is an evil mind."

::Dark Prime::

    He headed towards the Predacons b=
ase, hoping for some, well what would be hospitality. He soon reached it. (=
Either one, makes no difference to me)
    "Attention Predacons," He said, =
now in robot mode and standing outside the doorway. "My name is Optimus Pri=
me, but you may call me, Dark Prime. I wish to join your ranks."
  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Saturday, September 23, 2000 8:04 PM
  Subject: Re: An Evil Prime?!



  =
     
       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page  


  ::Hot Rod::

  "Sure, hold =
on." Hot Rod ran to his room, and returned. He now had one
  of the Autobot=
 symbols, that was on Optimus's shoulder. With the size
  differance, it wa=
s like Hot Rod was carrying, a medium sized TV.
